file_content.text: Those officers are well protected. The Imperial Guard can't get close.
Colonel. The officers are free. Their collars are scrap.
Those men owe you their lives. Ending up with a slaver can be worse than death.
We'll assign personal details. The Empire won't catch them again. Thank you.
Get to those officers. The Empire could sell them into slavery or worse.
Stop here. I need squads for a rescue offensive. You fit the bill.
Master Jedi. We've got a war crime on our hands. I need your help.
Glad you're here, Major. My CO won't send me any more squads.
Halt. I've got the right to conscript mercenaries, if you're for hire.
Colonel Marclonus, Fourth Infantry. We've just gotten word the Imperial Guard's captured some of our officers. A very select group.
Duros, Zabrak, Twi'lek... all non-humans. The Imperial Guard's interrogating them. Thinks we're weak, easier to crack. Ignorant scum.
If you let it affect you, the Empire wins.
Don't give in to hate.
If that's so, I've been losing to the Empire for a few decades now.
Be thankful your officers are still alive.
The Empire's done worse.
Just what do you think's going to happen when the interrogation ends?
Do these officers have important intel?
Is the Republic at risk?
Enough, but they won't talk. It's their punishment I'm worried about.
They call them "freaks," we call them "allies."
It's their loss.
We make the Republic strong. The Imps will find that out the hard way.
I can't keep the Empire straight anymore.
The Imperial Guard?
The Emperor's personal, hand-picked army. They answer directly to him.
I could care less what Imperials think.
They're no threat to me.
You're going to care if the Empire wins. Good slaver could break even you.
Do all Twi'leks get upset this easily?
Maybe you are weak.
I don't expect a human to understand. You're set for life if the Empire wins.
They've got the Republic's finest in shock collars. For slaves. They try to run, they get shocked. They breathe wrong, they get shocked.
After the Empire's gotten what they want, they'll sell those officers into slavery. Imperial house servants, Huttese gladiators or worse.
I won't let that happen.
You know a lot about this.
Born into it. Ten years as a Hutt's messenger. You never forget what that collar feels like.
So go rescue them.
I've sent squad after squad to their death trying to free those officers. We can't do it alone.
Every shock collar has its own key. We need to get those keys off the Imperial Guard before we can free our men.
We can't let those officers become Imperial slaves. I've got coordinates and hazard pay. Only thing left is you.
Of course I'll help.
If it shuts you up.
Good. Those men bled for the Republic. They deserve better than this.
Remember, get those shock collar keys first. Or those officers won't get very far.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
I'll find a way to free those men. With or without your help.
Low-down, dirty, no good Imperial pieces of bantha fodder....
